actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend title 44, United States Code, to provide for 98 copies of the daily edition of the Congressional Record to be furnished to each Representative, Delegate, and Resident Commissioner in Congress.

summary.text: Provides for ninety-eight copies of the daily edition of the Congressional Record to be furnished to each Representative, Delegate, and Resident Commissioner in Congress (presently sixty-eight furnished to each Representative and Resident Commissioner). (Amends 44 U.S.C. 906)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 44, United States Code, to provide for 98 copies of the daily edition of the Congressional Record to be furnished to each Representative, Delegate, and Resident Commissioner in Congress.
